001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Insert;
006import androidx.room.Query;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity.Alert;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010import java.util.List;
011
012@Dao
013public interface AlertDao {
014  String ALERT_QUERY = "SELECT * FROM alert";
015  String ALERT_QUERY_FOR_TRIGGERED_OR_NOT_TRIGGERED = "SELECT * FROM alert WHERE triggered = :triggered";
016  String TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL = "DELETE FROM alert";
017  String TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL_TRIGGERED = "DELETE FROM alert WHERE triggered = true";
018  String TRUNCATION_QUERY_ONE_TRIGGERED = "DELETE FROM alert WHERE alert_id = :alert_id";
019
020  @Insert
021  Single<Long> insert(Alert alert);
022
023  @Query(ALERT_QUERY)
024  LiveData<List<Alert>> getAlerts();
025  @Query(ALERT_QUERY_FOR_TRIGGERED_OR_NOT_TRIGGERED)
026  LiveData<List<Alert>> getAlertsTriggeredOrNotTriggered(boolean triggered);
027  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL)
028  Completable truncateAlerts();
029  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL_TRIGGERED)
030  Completable truncateAlertsTriggered();
031  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY_ONE_TRIGGERED)
032  Completable truncateAlertTriggered(long alert_id);
033
034}
